item.title: Signing HTTP Requests
item.description: Photo by Vanna Phon on Unsplash Getting Started with Envoy & Open Policy Agent — 09 — Learn how to use Envoy & OPA to sign and validate HTTP Requests This is the 9th Envoy & Open Policy Agent Getting Started Guide. Each guide is intended to explore a single feature and walk through a simple implementation. Each guide builds on the concepts explored in the previous guide with the end goal of building a very powerful authorization service by the end of the series.
